column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////You are correct that our broth is perhaps the most important aspect of our ramen. As such
column2: we use a Refractometer to check the thickness and consistency of the broth with every preparation. If the broth clarity doesn't meet a certain grade
column4: we do receive occasional critiques regarding saltiness and oiliness of the broths. Please know our chefs can adjust the level of salt and oil at the customer's request.
